content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-20, -70)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-20.0, -70.0) with no ingredients to smelt.
- Stone Furnace at position (-18.0, -70.0) with no ingredients to smelt.
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-23.0, -68.0) connected to transport belts and a wooden chest at position (-23.5, -69.5) containing iron ore and copper ore.
- Transport belts connecting the mining drill to the furnaces.

### Iron Plate Storage Facility at Position (-16.5, -64.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-19.0, -65.0) with no ingredients to smelt.
- Wooden Chest at position (-16.5, -64.5) containing iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-17.5, -64.5) transferring items from the furnace to the chest.
- Transport belts facilitating the movement of items between the entities.

### Iron Ore Mining Facility at Position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) currently out of fuel.
- Wooden Chest at position (-12.5, -54.5) containing iron ore.
- Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -54.5) transferring items from the mining drill to the chest.
- Transport belts connecting the mining drill to the chest.

### Central Smelting Facility at Position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) with no ingredients to smelt.
- Wooden Chest at position (1.5, 0.5) containing coal, iron ore, and iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (2.5, 0.5) transferring items between chests.

### Belt Networks
- Multiple belt groups facilitating the movement of resources between various entities across the map.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing transport belts
- Ensure that the target position for placing a transport belt is clear of any existing entities. Remove any obstructions before attempting to place a new belt.

### Errors with full chests
- Regularly check and empty chests that are full to prevent mining drills from halting operations due to lack of space.

### Errors with fuel management
- Ensure that all burner mining drills have sufficient fuel to operate. Regularly refuel drills to maintain continuous operation.
